message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I cannot disclose the specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1500000 to me.  I'm confident it has the potential to generate even more value for you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  Let me know your thoughts.
